subject: Football
Sports Medicine
Assaults
lead_paragraph: The Buccaneers said Talib, who fought with a teammate last season and had another confrontation with a teammate in the past off-season, would not be suspended by the club.
snippet: The Buccaneers said Talib, who fought with a teammate last season and had another confrontation with a teammate in the past off-season, would not be suspended by the club.
